title: Robotex
synopsis:
Robotex are highly advanced  metallic alien life-forms who are provided with infinite energy from a giant spinning top shaped core. However, they are oppressed by the mainframe and unable to have creativity. Kai, Taf and Iota have escaped this system to run away to earth. The mighty corps 1 from the Robotex mother planet, led by Volcan has been sent to chase after them. Yoo-seok and friends from earth become the amigos of Kai and his group to help the powerful Robotex unleash their strengths with creativity.

(Source: YouTube)
